```{r setup}
library(gdqdonations)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

donations <- augment_donations(gdqdonations::gdq_donations)
runs <- gdqdonations::gdq_runs
```

```{r}
gdq_donation_totals <-
  donations %>%
  group_by(event) %>%
  summarize(
    total = sum(amount),
    avg = mean(amount),
    gdq = unique(gdq),
    year = unique(year)
  ) %>%
  arrange(as.numeric(year)) %>%
  mutate(cumtot = cumsum(total))
```

```{r gdq-donation-totals}
gdq_donation_totals %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = total, fill = gdq)) +
  geom_col(position = position_dodge2(preserve = "single"), alpha = .75) +
  scale_x_year_discrete() +
  scale_y_currency(
    breaks = seq(0, 10e6, 5e5),
    minor_breaks = seq(0, 10e6, 2.5e5)
  ) +
  scale_colorfill_gdq() +
  labs(
    title = "Games Done Quick: Donation Totals",
    subtitle = "Donation totals as per the official tracker page"
  ) +
  theme_gdq()
```


```{r gdq-donations-timeline-per-event, eval=FALSE}
donations %>%
  #filter(as.numeric(year) >= 2019) %>% 
  filter(time_rel >= 0 & time_rel <= 1.2) %>%
  group_by(event) %>%
  mutate(
    amount_total = cumsum(amount)
  ) %>%
  # filter(event == "AGDQ2021") %>%
  # View()
  ggplot(aes(x = time_rel, y = amount_total, color = year)) +
  facet_wrap(~gdq) +
  geom_step() +
  theme_gdq()
```
